title: Roasted Butternut Squash
directions: Place butternut squash halves on a large baking sheet flesh side up. Place 1 teaspoon butter in the middle of each squash. Sprinkle brown sugar over each squash. Season with salt and black pepper. Roast 50 to 60 minutes, until flesh is fork-tender. Reserve 2 halves for future meal.
ingredients: 2 medium butternut squash, halved lengthwise and seeded
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
